description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get in Goolin, the giant robot! Use only the A button. Try to carefully consider how to go about each step along the way. Can you manage to get a higher score than your last attempt? If you find yourself playing more than 10 times, please purchase this one, since you're hooked!
